attributes.action: TO HELP THE PEOPLE OF PALISTINE FROM THE DEVASTATION THE ISRAELS HAVE CAUSED
attributes.additional_details: It is a matter of wrong and right
attributes.background: Our government have intervined in many conflict all over the work. The Palestinian conflict has been one that has been over looked.WHY? This is a conflict that needs the addressed urgently. Muslim are the victims in this situation and I dare say that us thr reason it has been looked over.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309

Introduce sanctions against Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314

UK Government to formally recognise the State of Palestine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585313
